Meet the latest version of Superstring.
What's new
  • You can add background videos.
  • You can apply “3D rotation” to the text.
  • New text styles “Cover”, “Cube”, “Stamp”, “Uncover” have been added.
  • New font group “Rounded” has been added.
  • The rendering quality has been improved.
  • The usability of the editor has been improved.
  • Minor issues have been fixed.

Available for Mac and Windows.
